author: "Salius Diversus, Petrus, 16th century"
title: "P. Salii Diversi Commentaria luculentissima in Hippocratis de quaesitis universalibus ad medicinam spectantibus, sive de morbis libros IV. In quibus author quasi manuductionem medicam proponit ad caetera Hippocratis & Galeni scripta tum recte intelligenda"
